channel.title: Need help adding comp cape!
channel.description: can anyone please walk me threw adding the comp cape with reqs i really need this and the current code i have tested says that the pubic class needs to be enabled in museumguard.java can anyone please help!? or just give me a different code!

item.title: Need help adding comp cape!
item.dc:creator: @darrien21 darrien21
item.description:
@darrien21 wrote:

its rune-evo 718 (ps the last part is my object handler)

package com.rs.game.player.dialogues;

import com.rs.cache.loaders.NPCDefinitions;
import com.rs.game.Graphics;
import com.rs.game.WorldTile;
import com.rs.game.player.Skills;
import com.rs.game.player.Player;

public class Completionist extends Dialogue {

private int npcId;

@Override
public void start() {
	npcId = (Integer) parameters[0];
		sendEntityDialogue(
			SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT,
			new String[] {
					NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
					"Hello " + player.getUsername() + " this is the Completionist Cape." +
					" Only the brave deserve this cape of shine! ",
					"Let's see if you deserve this cape or not."}, IS_NPC, npcId,
			9760);
	stage = -1;
}

@Override
public void run(int interfaceId, int componentId) {
	if (stage == -1) {
		sendOptionsDialogue("Select a Option", "I would like to see the requirements.",
				"Nevermind, I am not interested.");
	}
	if (componentId == OPTION_1) {
		player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(719);
		player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275);
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 1, "Road to Completionist Cape");
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 10, "All 99's and 120 Dungeoneering.");
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 11, "Completed Fight Caves.");
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 12, "Completed Fight Kiln.");
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 13, "Killed the QBD.");
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 24, "<col=FF0000>New requirements are added every week.</col>");
		player.getInterfaceManager().closeChatBoxInterface();
	}
		if (componentId == OPTION_2) {
			player.getInterfaceManager().closeChatBoxInterface();
			player.sm("You where not interested.");
		}
}
@Override
public void finish() {

}

}

            if (id == 2562) {
	    player.getDialogueManager().startDialogue("Completionist");
            }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding comp cape!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Uhm, adding the comp cape should only take:
ints (For Itemdef.java or if nonrenamed, Class8.java)
models (drop model and wear model)
1 line of code for item.cfg
I don’t know what you were trying to do, but it sounds wrong…
